name: 曾傳蘆
objective:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallel
circuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuit
analysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuits
PSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms
